services:
Home Assure Plus
The Right Solutions For The Right Reasons
HOME ASSURE PLUS is an exclusive set of eight services offered by 4Sight Inspections and is included with every Home Inspection at no extra charge. You will not find this level of commitment or confidence in Home Inspection Service anywhere else.

A sample of what HOME ASSURE PLUS provides:
Re-visit*
If repairs are negotiated as a direct result of the inspection performed and the inspection report provided by 4Sight Inspections we will revisit the property at your request and at a mutually convenient time to re-inspect the contractually repaired components to ensure the repair is complete and satisfactory.

Walk-a-way***
If there are major concerns found with the inspected house that cause you to walk away from the purchase agreement I will inspect the next home you place an offer on at half price. i.e. if second home had a rate of $375 then you would only pay $185.

30 Day Warranty
We offer a 30 Day Warranty for structural and mechanical components in the home at no extra charge. 

We provide home inspections, professional home inspectors, certified home inspectors, home inspection guarantee and the best home inspection service in the industry.

profile:
Voted Best Home Inspection Company in Toronto by Home Stars!

Best Of HomeStars! - 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 & 2019!

If you are looking for a reliable and qualified home inspection company with the best services in the Toronto area, only trust the experts at Allmax. Here at Allmax Home Inspections we are the trusted source for home buyers in the area, and we make sure our clients make informed decisions before making the biggest purchase of their lives. Visit: http://allmaxhomes.ca for pricing information. Our team of expert inspectors will be able to see what the other guys can't! We are trained in mold detection and removal. If you are concerned your dream house might be hiding something, make sure to call the experts at Allmax and avoid a nasty surprise! Founded in 2005, AllMax Home and Property Inspections has quickly grown to be the premier inspection service for residential and business properties in the greater Toronto area. We take a customer first approach with our detailed reports and personal touch on each one of our inspections. Our company only hires experienced inspectors that have both inspector experience, as well as building experience for our residential and commercial properties. As the leader in Toronto home inspection services, we here at Allmax will continue to provide to top rated inspection services from our team of experienced inspectors. No matter if you are a first time buyer or looking for investment properties trust the experts at Allmax with your Toronto home inspection. Come see the difference a HomeStars award winning inspector can make to the purchase of your dream home and give the professionals a visit on our website at http://allmaxhomes.ca for more information.

profile: Welcome to Classic Home Inspections Inc. Call or text us at 416 458 5895 We have been featured on "HGTV" and "CBC NEWSWORLD" Thank you for checking us out! As you will see, we only have 100% REAL CUSTOMER REVIEWS written below. I DO NOT subcontract out to other home inspectors. We have been on Homestars for 10 years!!! With Homestars we allow you to tell us how we are doing. You want to make sure that you are going to hire someone who is qualified for the job, goes through the home with great detail, and provides you a fully written report. Why not do a little research on a company before making that call? Classic Home Inspections is NOT here to sell you on us and tell you that we are “the best”, or tell you that we are “the most trusted”. We are on here to allow the people who have used our services to tell you how we are doing. The hundreds of Classic Home Inspections reviews are from REAL CUSTOMERS. We at Classic Home Inspections think the purpose of Homestars is to tell you what people think of us, not to tell you how we think we are. We hope you find it a useful tool when looking for a home inspector. Our goal at Classic Home Inspections is to have you understand the home as well as we do. We offer competitive rates and flexible hours. Thank you for all those who have found us on Homestars and for choosing Classic Home Inspections.

profile: Home Inspector, Home Inspection Proudly serving clients in the GTA and surrounding areas. DSM Property Services is proud to provide our clients with professional, reliable inspection services. All our inspections are conducted by a qualified and fully accredited Registered Home Inspector (RHI) and Certified Thermographer with over 25 years experience in construction and renovation. Our inspection services include: • Detailed Inspection of all visible structures and components of a home, • Infrared thermal scans* of non-visible structures and components to detect potential issues with moisture, electrical, and insulation • Use of the latest Inspection Technology • Repair and cost estimates • Recommendations and Maintenance planning • A fully detailed and easy to read report of all findings including pictures for quick reference • A reference library and links to more detailed information on the components of the home You also have the option to purchase a detailed Home History Report. *Infrared Thermal Scans are part of our premium package and are conducted to detect what the naked eye cannot. This process can identify potential problems in structure, electrical components, insulation, air leakage and moisture content. An Infrared Scan can: • help locate potential safety issues with live electrical equipment, • detect hidden heating and cooling losses, • detect moisture intrusion which could cause mould, • detect inadequate or non-existent insulation, • detect plumbing leaks and poor construction. • It could save you in potential repair costs!! Book a thermal scan inspection: * Before a warranty inspection * Before a Real Estate Investment * Before a contractor begins work * After a completed project * As part of a routine maintenance check on your home. Doing your homework on finding the right Home Inspector is crucial. You need to make sure you are hiring a qualified and experienced Inspector. After all, this person will be providing you with the information you need to make an informed decision about some very costly investments, whether it be the purchase or selling of a home, a new home renovation or existing repair, maintenance of your existing home or potential issues you are having. We hope that DSM Property Services Inc. can help you with your inspection needs! Please visit our website and our Facebook page for regular updates on home inspection and construction information! Like us on Facebook! Qualifications of the Inspector: *Graduate of the Home Inspection Training Program from Sheridan College Technical Institute with over 500 hours of formal class training *Completed Building Code and Health & Safety Training offered by the Ministry of Municipal Affairs & Housing *Accredited Level 1 Thermographer *25 + years background in Construction, experience in renovation and property management *Member of Canadian Association of Home and Property Inspectors (CAHPI) and Ontario Association of Home Inspectors (OAHI) *Current in Home Inspection training and workshops *Mentors individuals looking to enter the home inspection field
